subheader: Your one stop to awaken your dreams
text: Whether you've always dreamt of stretching like Luffy, fighting like Goku, or conjuring magical spells as a wizard from a distant fantasy realm like Hermione Granger, Cosmania has got you covered. Cosmania is your chance to bring your beloved characters to life. From galaxies far, far away to the realms of fantasy, and even the thrilling adventures of your favourite video game icons, our stage is set for you to shine. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned cosplayer, it doesn't matter; it's all about embracing the magic of pop culture and having a blast with fellow enthusiasts. So, what are you waiting for? Suit up, armor on, or cape billowing – join us at Incandescene 2k25 and let the cosplay chaos commence!

Espremiere is your platform to unleash your inner storyteller. Whether you're a seasoned performer or a budding talent, we welcome you to bring your unique voice and vision to life. From poignant social commentary to hilarious satire, from heartwarming tales to thrilling mysteries, Espremier is where your monologue takes center stage.

subheader: For good ideas and true innovation, you need human interaction, conflict, argument and debate.
text: Are you passionate about enacting the pressing issues of our society, transforming into characters who challenge norms, and becoming the voice of change? Nukkad welcomes you to bring these characters to life. From tales that unravel societal inequalities to those that challenge environmental negligence and break gender stereotypes, our street is your canvas to showcase these powerful narratives. Whether you're a novice performer or an experienced street actor, everyone's voice matters in this transformative journey. It's all about harnessing the power of street theatre to spark conversations and inspire action. So, gather your troupe, embrace your roles, and join us at Nukkad 2025 to ignite the stage with the fervor of change!

Attention all, brace yourselves for a night of grandiose revelry! The Prom Night is upon us, and the theme for this year's festivities shall transport us to the glittering world of the 90s.Prepare to immerse yourselves in the magnificence of a bygone era, where music and dance reign supreme. Do not miss this opportunity to celebrate in grand style and bask in the nostalgia of a golden age. Stay tuned for more information, and secure your tickets now for an unforgettable evening of revelry and remembrance.
Ever stolen glances at FTV, scrolled through Cosmopolitan, or practised your fashion walk in your dorm room? Your moment has arrived!

Just like the big bang marks the beginning of our universe,every year a Flash Mob signals the start of our cultural fest,  Incandescence! It's a brief but intense burst of energy,  transforming the ordinary into an unforgettable display.  Appearing at a public spot with an air of intrigue, we  effortlessly execute a rapid and exhilarating performance  before vanishing into the surroundings. Its charm comes  from its brief, exciting moments. The performance is quick  but full of energy. In those short minutes, it breaks the  monotony and turns into a lively show that you won't forget.
The cultural festival, Incandescence, is showcasing a captivating exhibition of digital and fine arts on our campus.
Slashing through your words till your opponent bites their tongue? Arguments so strong, facts so intact, questions so powerful that nobody can push you down! Sounds interesting?
Embark on a journey where your voice shapes your global solutions. Every debate is an opportunity and every resolution paves the way for change.

The quizzing module of the Incandescence'25, Sokratic, is nothing short of a cerebral adventure  where you will have to grasp on to your thinking caps.Get ready for two days of intellectual excitement as we plunge you into the realms of General and MELA  themed quizzes that might set your minds ablaze. We  have brought to you esteemed quizmasters like  Bhushan Patel, Somnath Chanda, Abhra Das, Titash  Banerjee and many more. Nervous clicking of pens,  scratching of heads, ticking of the timer and all the  victorious ‘aah’s and slightly missed ‘ooh’s awaits you  at the best platform you can possibly get to sharpen  that rust right off your brains! So, the quiz-tastic  carnival of Sokratic and its vibrant hues of bewildering  questions merge under the Incandescence’25 to give  you a once in a lifetime opportunity. Don’t miss it!
Your Spotify wrapped but live, sounds enchanting right? This module under Incandescence’25 will bring to you, an evening filled with music that strikes those chords embedded in your heart
This isn't your typical gig; it's a sonic expedition where bands break free from the mainstream and let their unique sounds resonate through the air.
Under the twinkle of stars and the soft glow of fairy lights, in a mood oh-so-romantic,Indie Unplugged comes to you as an escape from the mainstream
Get Ready to witness the epitome of strength and sculpted physiques at 'Mr. NIT,' our premier bodybuilding competition that's set to redefine fitness and showcase the embodiment of dedication
Welcome to InfluenceFiesta: The Ultimate Influencer Extravaganza! Get ready for a night dedicated to the digital maestros shaping our online world

In the heart of NIT Silchar beats a rhythm of creativity, where lenses are wielded like wands, conjuring tales from pixels and light. Obiettivo, the Photography Club, in association with Incandescence 2025, invites you to join the magical journey of FRAMES 2025.

Prepare to transcend the ordinary and embark on a sonic journey through the labyrinth of music and memories. Incandescence '25 at NIT Silchar proudly presents Thundermarch, a night of electrifying energy and unforgettable performances.The countdown has begun, and anticipation is reaching fever pitch as Incandescence draws near. We're thrilled to unveil the first act in our stellar lineup: the dynamic duo of Cerbinine and Maestro! These musical maestros are ready to ignite the stage, unleashing a torrent of pure metal power.

Get ready for Nirvana under Incandescence'25, featuring the Bollywood band ft. Arjun Kanungo! This electrifying night promises to be a blend of Arjun’s biggest hits and high-energy Bollywood tunes, creating an unforgettable experience.


Arjun Kanungo is a powerhouse in the Indian music industry, known for delivering hit after hit. From the party anthem "Baaki Baatein Peene Baad" to the soulful "Fursat" and the playful "Gallan Tipsiyaan," his music covers every mood.

But these are just a glimpse of his diverse repertoire. A multi-talented singer, composer, and performer, Arjun's ability to blend heartfelt lyrics with infectious beats has cemented his place as one of the most dynamic artists in the scene today.

A night where books take a break, deadlines don’t exist, and the only assignment is to laugh till your stomach hurts—Comedy Knight is back,and this time, it’s bigger, bolder, and funnier than ever! And who better to own the stage than the man who doesn’t just tell jokes—he rewrites reality with punchlines?Hands down to the only man with humor that hits with “ Did he really kust say that?”Madhur Virli, the IIT Delhi graduate who swapped circuits for sarcasm and equations for epic comebacks. Surviving IIT is one thing, surviving cancer is another, but doing both and then choosing to roast life on stage? That’s next-level audacity. With humor sharper than a CAT percentile and an ability to make even the darkest realities feel light, he’s set to turn your evening into a full-blown laughter riot.

Step into the lucid labyrinth of music and memories as Incandescence’25 NIT Silchar presents : EDM Night! Lose yourself in a maze of electrifying beats, dazzling lights, and high-energy drops that pulse through the night. As the music builds, let the bass shake your soul, the rhythm take control, and the euphoria consume you. This isn’t just a concert—it’s your path to a night where chaos transforms into harmony, and every drop ignites pure exhilaration. Seize the night, dance through the labyrinth, and let the DJs take over!Bringing the house down with an explosive lineup,  EDM Night  features three electrifying maestros behind the deck—DJ Tracer, DJ Suit Up, and DJ Voila! Get ready for DJ Tracer, known for his high-voltage drops and seamless transitions that keep the energy soaring. DJ Suit Up will take you on a sonic journey with his signature blend of bass-heavy beats and euphoric melodies. And to top it all off, DJ Voila will set the stage ablaze with her electrifying mixes, turning every heartbeat into a rhythm. Together, they promise a night of pulse-pounding music, insane visuals, and an atmosphere that’ll leave you breathless.
